technologies.title: Tools & Technologies
technologies.items: Jira, Redmine, Asana, Trello, Notion, Google Workspace, Microsoft Office Suite, Excel, Odoo, Android Studio, Java, PHP, MySQL, Scala, Akka HTTP

missions: Managed a portfolio of 15+ web projects, consistently delivering on schedule and earning positive client feedback across all engagements.
Oversaw stakeholder communications, ensuring alignment with clients and internal teams.
Collaborated with developers on debugging, server setup, and security monitoring, reducing technical issues by 25%.
Led cross-functional teams, keeping projects on schedule and ensuring key deliverables were completed on time.
Monitored project budgets and client billing ensuring financial accuracy and contract compliance.
Monitored project KPIs and costs, ensuring optimal resource allocation and alignment with business objectives.
Facilitated Agile ceremonies for a team of 8â€“10 developers, removing blockers and improving sprint efficiency.
Conducted technical interviews and code reviews, supporting final hiring decisions.
Coordinated communication between developers, product owners, and PMs, ensuring alignment on project goals and deliverables.

Acted as the key coordinator between the project manager, who interfaced with clients to gather requirements, and freelance developers, translating client needs into detailed technical specifications.
Collaborated with freelance developers on a high-priority project, providing detailed specifications and conducting daily check-ins to ensure progress and alignment.
Reviewed and tested deliverables, ensuring quality standards were met.
Designed, developed, and implemented a user-friendly learning game application for Android using Java and Android Studio, enhancing learning experiences for users.
Created a PHP RESTful API enabling data retrieval.
Developed a PHP-based dashboard for administrators, facilitating efficient content management, user account management, and data analysis.
Developed microservices in Scala with Akka HTTP.
Created RESTful APIs for efficient and secure data exchange between microservices.
Connected microservices to MySQL, designed schemas, and optimized data storage.
